execution_quality: The agent systematically searched for fingerprint sensor information using multiple relevant tools (lsusb, lspci, dmesg, etc.) but appears to have missed or not found the actual hardware despite reasonable attempts.
work_category: Hardware capability detection task using system tools to identify fingerprint sensor and secure enclave features on a Linux laptop.
summary: The agent conducted a methodical hardware detection investigation using appropriate Linux tools but failed to identify the actual fingerprint sensor hardware, likely because it didn't know to look for integrated power button sensors specifically. The user's follow-up suggests the agent's search strategy was misaligned with the actual hardware configuration, requiring course correction and further investigation with better search parameters.
follow_up_pattern: User provided a technical correction/hint that the power button itself is the fingerprint reader, suggesting the agent's search approach may have looked in wrong places or used wrong search terms.
